short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome and most of the web browser have this feature, but this is my personal tool to find divs and elements that doesnt show on it
short.es: Chrome y la mayoría de los navegadores web tienen esta función, pero esta es mi herramienta personal para encontrar divs y…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides a 3D view of the entire website, which is a functionality that some browsers already offer natively. However, this extension goes a step further by allowing you to see other layers you're working on that aren't typically displayed in standard browser 3D views. Additionally, it offers a stylish visualization of how the website looks, which can help in managing z-indexes and ensuring that elements are properly arranged on the page.
